import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import {useDispatch,useSelector} from "react-redux" import itinerariesActions from "../redux/actions/itinerariesActions" let emoji = "ğŸ’µ" function CardItineararies(){ const dispatch = useDispatch() const [reload, setReload] = useState() const [likes, setLikes] = useState() const user = useSelector(store=>store.userReducer.user) async function likesDislikes() { const like = await dispatch(itinerariesActions.like(itinerary._id)) setLikes(like) setReload(!reload) } return(

{itinerary.person}

{itinerary.itineraryName}

{emoji.repeat(itinerary.price)}

{itinerary.duration}

{ user && user ? () : ()}

{itinerary.likes.length}

See Activities

{itinerary.hashtags.map(hashtags=>(

{hashtags}

))}
{itinerary.activities.map(activities=>(

{activities.activity}

))}
) } export default CardItineararies
